name: Smadreland Simulator 2018
description:
Game made for the danish metal festvial Copenhell (2018). 
DOWNLOAD BELOW.

_____________________________________________________________

Smash and destroy old cars and appliances with axes, hammers, guitars and flamethrowers! Play up to 4 players and see who can smash the most!

  • 1-4 players
  • Smash stuff to metal music!
  • Play as legendary metal musicians
  • Badass weapons
  • Battle with Satan

NOTE: Requires controllers to play! (Xbox or PC controllers recommended)

_____________________________________________________________

The game has been updated since the festival with 2 new characters + minor changes and fixes.

This game was inspired by Smadreland at Copenhell.

Made by:
Christian Larsson (https://a-c-l.itch.io/)
Erik Andersen (https://onkelerik.itch.io/)
Mikkel Thygesen
Jonathan Hertz
